reports.label: Use of RFC 8415 solely as historical background reference
reports.explanation: Section 3 directs readers to RFC 8415 for IPv6 background material even though the background has been removed, which may be confusing as the reference is used solely for historical context.
justification: The analysis excerpt explains that background material on IPv6 has been removed and readers are directed to RFC 8415 for that background, keeping the section only for numbering alignment (E1).
The candidate issue explicitly labels this as a use of RFC 8415 solely as historical background reference (E2).
